title: Creative Environmental Literacy Development Process Through Slam Poetry

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental literacy skills and general awareness of environmental issues
context.additional_context: Activity design optimized for smartphone-based learning environments, emphasizing practical skills applicable in elementary education settings.

learning_goals: Learners can create one slam poem themed on local environmental issues.
Learners can produce multimedia expressions combining text, images, and audio using multiliteracy pedagogy.
Learners can revise and improve their creative work at least twice through peer feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
